name: CREEPY
description:
A soldier found himself get trapped in the small zombie town that running out of electricity.
Try to find the way out of the town by fixing the system of the town. should be easy tasks, but the real problem is those super intelligent good looking zombies yet annoying. You have 3 Attempts to solve it. 

*indoor is a safe space.
*tap on the screen to push the zombie away
but this does not work frequently.

Good Luck !
